# [Model 1] Random Forest

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE) 
```

```{r}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(randomForest)
library(datasets)
library(caret)

data <- read.csv('online_retail_cleaned.csv')
# str(data)
```

```{r}
# train test split
set.seed(5293)
ind <- sample(2, nrow(data), replace = TRUE, prob = c(0.75, 0.25))
train <- data[ind==1, ]
train <- subset(train, select = -c(Quantity, X, date))
test <- data[ind==2, ]
test <- subset(test, select = -c(Quantity, X, date)) 
```

```{r}
rf <- randomForest(Sales~., data = train)

```
